<title level="1" right="Hazard 20" pfs="">[Glimpse Grave](/Hazards.aspx?ID=150)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Haunt" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=88" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 67</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A tombstone bears the name of those who look upon it, causing their hearts to seize.

---

**Stealth**
DC 48 (expert) to notice the words on the tombstone waver

**Disable**
DC 45 [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) (legendary) to bless the tombstone or DC 50 [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) (trained) to ward off spirits

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Stop Heart** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40), [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101), [ <%TRAITS%120%%> occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120) <%END>, visual) **Trigger** A creature reads or touches the tombstone; **Effect** The haunt deals 8d10+44 negative damage (DC 47 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save) to all creatures within 60 feet who can see the tombstone and can read any language. On a critical failure, a creature dies.

---
**Reset**
1 day
